name: AdvancedOpenScreenPayload
description: A custom payload that allows for opening screens with additional data.

fields.name: windowId
fields.description: The field for the windowId record component.

fields.name: menuType
fields.description: The field for the menuType record component.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The field for the name record component.

fields.name: additionalData
fields.description: The field for the additionalData record component.

constructors.name: AdvancedOpenScreenPayload
constructors.description: Creates an instance of a AdvancedOpenScreenPayload record class.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of this record class. The representation contains the name of the class, followed by the name and value of each of the record components.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Returns a hash code value for this object. The value is derived from the hash code of each of the record components.

methods.name: equals
methods.description: Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. Reference components are compared with Objects::equals(Object,Object) ; primitive components are compared with '=='.

methods.name: windowId
methods.description: Returns the value of the windowId record component.

methods.name: menuType
methods.description: Returns the value of the menuType record component.

methods.name: name
methods.description: Returns the value of the name record component.

methods.name: additionalData
methods.description: Returns the value of the additionalData record component.
